title: Roasted sweet potato and sweetcorn chowder
ingredients: ['2 sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '350g frozen sweetcorn kernels, thawed', '250ml water', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '175g finely diced celery', '125g diced red onion', '4 tablespoons minced shallot', '1 tablespoon tomato paste', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme leaves', '750ml vegetable stock', '1 bay leaf', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 potato, peeled and cubed', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
